elements.content:
Conners' Adult ADHD Rating Scale.
Report: Short Version (CAARS-S:S)

Below are behaviors or problems that can sometimes affect adults.
Read this list and see if each item applies to your case and how often.

elements.title: CAARS-S:S Questionnaire
scale: just a little, once in a while

elements.text: I interrupt others when talking
I am always on the go, as if driven by a motor
I am disorganized
It's difficult for me to stay in one place for very long
I have difficulty keeping track of several things at once
I get bored easily
I get easily angry / I am hot-tempered
I still have temper outbursts
I avoid new challenges because I lack faith in my abilities
I seek out fast-paced, exciting activities
I feel restless inside even when sitting still
I am easily distracted from what I'm doing by sounds or images
Many things set me off easily or make me upset
I don't try to be outstanding
I am hard on myself
I act okay on the outside, but inside I feel unsure of myself
I can't get things done unless there's a strict deadline
I have trouble getting started on tasks
I intrude on others' activities even when not invited
My moods are unpredictable
I am absent-minded in daily activities
Sometimes my attention is so focused on something that I forget everything else, and other times it's so "open" that everything distracts me
I tend to fidget a lot and can't stay still
I can't concentrate on something unless it's really interesting
I wish I had more confidence in my abilities
I have trouble believing in myself because of my past failures
